title: Radisson Hotel Group announces second hotel in Ayodhya with EaseMyTrip, Jeewani Hospitality
description: Radisson Hotel Group announces the opening of its second hotel in Ayodhya, developed by Jeewani Hospitality. The hotel is expected to open in 2027. The hotel will be located near Maharishi Valmiki International Airport and will offer road connectivity via National Highway-27. Guests can explore nearby religious sites and the partnership with EaseMyTrip is highly regarded.
